QuestData.Title: Sporicide
QuestData.Description: It's revolting, absolutely disgusting, infuriating even!$b$bI'm talking about seeing those spore creatures walking around Pinchwhistle Point.$b$bWhile I'm working on the machine here how about you go out and kill off some of those spore creatures? I'll feel a bit better knowing there are less of those things moving around.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Spore Shamblers in Pinchwhistle Point.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you put down those spore creatures yet?
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n.$b$bThe less of those spore beasts around the safer we all are.
